name: Nohtaram
description:
Left joystick to move, right to use item.

Black hole - Drops a trap that if your opponent steps on will swap your positions

Goat - Summon a goat horde to force your opponent forward

Water Bottle - Throw a water bottle in a target direction to restore their stamina and speed them up

Fans - Sick some fans on your opponent to cheer them on to the finish line!
